title: Judgin' Like It's 1992
description: Bailiff Jesse returns to the courtroom! Judge Hodgman rules on the Oxford comma, Hawaiian short pants, and tries not to hurt anyone's "Disney feelings".
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
